name: Red Chungus
description:
The game may not load, if so click the link below! 

https://followpq^3formorequalitygameslikethisonedude.hi

Defend the Land of Chungi! 

While BIG BRO Attacks in Big Chungus Battle Royale, Red Chungus is left to defend the Land of Chungi!

Instructions:

The up and down arrow keys control Red Chungus.
The space bar cause Red Chungus to shoot an energy ball. 
Energy balls will send the Doggos back but if Friendly Friend touches them Red Chungus will die. 
Red Chungus also dies if the Doggos touch him or the Chunga Chant Wall 

Credits: 

Game, Music, and the lovely artwork was made by PQ^3.
